description: Developed and maintained interactive, map-driven user interfaces for a large-scale property intelligence platform using MapLibre and Next.js.
Implemented multi-layer map systems with dynamic styling, filtering, and feature selection for properties and available units.
Integrated and processed GIS datasets (GeoJSON) to visualize property boundaries, availability, and spatial insights.
Built location-based insights such as noise levels, traffic density, and surrounding infrastructure to support informed property decisions.
Utilized Turf.js for geospatial computations including distance calculations, buffering, and spatial analysis.
Worked on subscription-based product features, enabling plan-based access control and feature availability on the frontend.
Collaborated with product and backend teams to translate complex geospatial data into intuitive, user-friendly experiences.
Developed and maintained multiple web applications using SvelteKit, React, and Node.js
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
Implemented responsive designs and optimized application performance
